title: inspace
author: inspace
content: Hello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Hello and welcome to Bitcointalk forum.  I can test your platform and give you an objective review that will help you provide an excellent user experience for your client.Feel free to contact me to discuss the details.Thanks

comments.author: uche6215
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates. Are you from Bestchange company and if not then you have to provide the exchanger's website for the tester to see what he is she is about describe. There is no hidden agenda in the forum so you have to open up and drop everything here for interested users to see and apply. As it is now. It is blinded application. Nobody knows what they are applying. Please put more effects on your Op. The test is too plain. First of all you describe what they are going to describe. For someone to describe something he has to see the thing first. Therefore, drop the exchange site.

comments.author: inspace
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on June 14, 2023, 02:30:23 PMHello and welcome to Bitcointalk forum.  I can test your platform and give you an objective review that will help you provide an excellent user experience for your client.Feel free to contact me to discuss the details.ThanksAccepted! The information has been sent to you.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on June 14, 2023, 02:35:30 PMAre you from Bestchange company and if not then you have to provide the exchanger's website for the tester to see what he is she is about describe. There is no hidden agenda in the forum so you have to open up and drop everything here for interested users to see and apply. As it is now. It is blinded application. Nobody knows what they are applying. I do not think it is working with Bestchange, but one if the websites that is listed on Bestchange. Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.No one know how reputed you are and it will be good to use escrow: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0

comments.author: Eh Moo Nah
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on June 14, 2023, 02:37:56 PMNo one know how reputed you are and it will be good to use escrow: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0O.P. is only Offering $15 for the Review and if O.P. will hire an escrow from the Link that you share, he needs to  pay  $28.59 just to make sure that the Transfer will be safe and Secured. The escrow minimum Fee of the link that you shared is 0.001 in BTC. it would be best if O.P. will send half of the amount of the reward to His chosen candidate while doing the review.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.Your first post was back in January and you are looking for a campaign manager for your platform, it's already 6 months but there's no mention of your platform or project, we just got a hint that it's an exchange because of this thread.What's keeping you from naming your platform or creating a thread is it because it's still in beta if it is, then it's the more you post it here so people will have an idea if they want to apply as a reviewer because of their prior experience of reviewing similar platforms like yours.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Eh Moo Nah on June 14, 2023, 03:26:21 PMO.P. is only Offering $15 for the Review and if O.P. will hire an escrow from the Link that you share, he needs to  pay  $28.59 just to make sure that the Transfer will be safe and Secured. The escrow minimum Fee of the link that you shared is 0.001 in BTC. it would be best if O.P. will send half of the amount of the reward to His chosen candidate while doing the review. Money is needed in marketing. Because of lack of money, many project failed. I hope OP can understand what I am talking about. He wants people to review a site for him, he needs more reviews and needs to do things in a way that people will know their efforts to increase traffic into their website.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on June 14, 2023, 03:42:10 PMWhat's keeping you from naming your platform or creating a thread is it because it's still in beta if it is, then it's the more you post it here so people will have an idea if they want to apply as a reviewer because of their prior experience of reviewing similar platforms like yours.Yes I support you. Instead of selecting two persons to review the site why can't the op create a ANN thread for discussion and later, when there is money, he can create a full review campaign thread for his project. Only two users will not give all he needs in the project. At least you need more user to tell you their opinion about the site. Even you pay $15 each for like 10 to 20 users is okay. Op if I were you, I would have restrategize the plan.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.I'm interested in reviewing your website and testing all the features of your exchange. I love reviewing applications and websites and I give my honest opinion about the platform that I review. I write comprehensive and detailed reviews by giving enough time to test the platform deeply before writing my review.Following is the review that I completed yesterday:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418423.msg62401705#msg62401705

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.I am in to test your website as well. As others suggested, it would be great if you could share all details about your product here as well. So we know we are talking about a real product and not some possible scam or high yield product (which most reputable users will refuse to review)

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.Hey I am always interested with reviewing exchanges. I worked for 2 different CEX in the past, and I am always curious to test as much as possible new services. You can browse my profile and my history to see the reviews I've done here too.Don't hesitate to contact me, see you soon!

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 14, 2023, 02:28:28 PMHello. I am looking for two people who will test and describe what can be added or improved in the exchanger. I also expect that the tester will add a list of sites to the description (analogues of BestChange).$15 payment in Bitcoins (Pay as soon as you've been approved).Please post your application here in the thread and I will select two candidates.As many users here requested to reveal your exchanger name and address in public, i don’t think that anyone will take his time for something that’s not surely exist in first place. Your topic for a campaign is missing a lot of things and details, if you’re willing to start a good and successful exchanger I’m telling you this is a very bad start in my humble opinion.If you willing to publish your exchanger’s website then I’m ready to share my review about it freely and all what i know about exchangers as a user

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I wonder where will the reviewers post their reviews, I have seen campaigns about platform reviews and they have an official thread where to post their reviews so it should be on this thread or are you going to create a separate campaign for that?I'm not going to apply for reviews but I always check and read reviews about platforms who knows this could be the platform that I'm going to use in the future.

comments.author: inspace
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on June 14, 2023, 07:11:04 PMI am in to test your website as well. As others suggested, it would be great if you could share all details about your product here as well. So we know we are talking about a real product and not some possible scam or high yield product (which most reputable users will refuse to review)I already paid one guy. You are the second member I would like to hire.Please send me your bitcoin address so that I can make an advance payment.After that, I will send a link to the transaction and all related information in a personal message.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Hi, I am interested. I have made plenty of good reviews for other services before and will be happy to try this one. If I am approved, let me know and I will send you my Bitcoin address before trying out.If you want a higher quality review, please include some extra BTC for transaction fees involved with using the service. For $15, after network fees and service fees, I expect only coming out with $10. Then to transfer that somewhere else will incur more fees. So $20-$25 is more fair, and I will compensate with a higher quality, in-depth review.Looking forward to working with you!

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on June 15, 2023, 04:00:36 AMQuote from: bitmover on June 14, 2023, 07:11:04 PMI am in to test your website as well. As others suggested, it would be great if you could share all details about your product here as well. So we know we are talking about a real product and not some possible scam or high yield product (which most reputable users will refuse to review)I already paid one guy. You are the second member I would like to hire.Please send me your bitcoin address so that I can make an advance payment.After that, I will send a link to the transaction and all related information in a personal message.Thanks.I have received the payment and I already started my review
